lines.text: What sort of respectable mummy snuffs it without leaving a mothercurse on her tomb?
He's waiting in purgatory for the day of his rebirth -- which happens to be this Thursday!

262. Nine months of digging, finally an entrance has been discovered. My hunch proved correct that along this secluded stretch lie a series of tombs but who would be buried here? A Pharaoh I presume? Hidden Safely from ancient thieves. Today We uncover the truth!
